mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bd_config_context ( id, parentId, code, name, value, module, remark, validateExpression, modifyAble, leaf, attributes, lastUpdateDate, createDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{value}, #{module}, #{remark}, #{validateExpression}, #{modifyAble}, #{leaf}, #{attributes}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE bd_config_context
parentId = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
value = #{value,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
validateExpression = #{validateExpression,javaType=java.lang.String},
leaf = #{leaf,javaType=boolean},
attributes = #{attributes,javaType=java.lang.String},
modifyAble = #{modifyAble,javaType=boolean},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
AND code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND module = #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
